sinks.description: An object represeting all Vector sinks keyed by the sink's name.

sources.description: An object represeting all Vector soures keyed by the source's name.

transforms.description: An object represeting all Vector transforms keyed by the transform's name.

event_fields.description: Information about fields that this transform adds to events.

event_types.description: A list of allowed Vector event types.

examples.description: An array of examples. These should be simple examples that demonstrate component behavior.

body.description: The output exmaple body. Markdown syntax is supported.

label.description: The output label. This will be used in the tab name if multiple output examples are provided.

field.description: A Vector field, such as a component option, environment variable, log schema field, etc.

category.description: The field category. This will group the option with other related category options.

common.description: If this option is a common option. Common options are shown by default in the documentation. It's a way to reduce the noise in configuration examples.

default.description: The default value of this option, if applicable.

description.description: The human friendly description of this option, markdown syntax is supported.

examples.description: An array of example values used for documentation purposes.

field_path_notation.description: Does this option support the field notation syntax?

groups.description: The overaching group that this configuration belongs to. This is an advanced option that should be used for large groups of mutually exclusive options. For example, a set of options specifically for v1 and another set for v2.

partition_key.description: If this option can be used to partition data. For example, the `path` option in the `aws_s3` sink.

relevant_when.description: An object representing the conditions when an option is relevant. This is commonly used in conjuntion with `type` or `strategy` options.

templateable.description: If this option support Vectors template/event field interpolation syntax.

toml_display.description: How to display this option in TOML examples.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the option value

visibility_level.description: The visiblity level. `component` will bubble up the warning at the top of the component page (higher visibility). `option` will display the warning on the option only (lower visibility).

fields.description: An object of fields keyed by the field's name.

operating_systems.description: A list of Vector support operating systems.

permissions.description: An object of permissions keyed by the permission's name.

permission.description: A Vector permission, such as a AWS IAM, GCP IAM, or Kubernetes RBAC permission.

aws_imds_v2.description: If access to the AWS IMDSv2 service is required.

clickhouse.description: The minimum Docker API version required.

docker_api.description: The minimum Docker API version required.

file_system.description: Requires access to the file system

heroku.description: If the Heroku platform is required.

network_port.description: The network port that this component exposes.

service_providers.description: A list of providers that offer this service.

sink.description: A component that outputs/sends data from Vector.

beta.description: Is this component in beta status?

common.description: Is this sink common? Shold it be highlighted in a list of all sinks?

description.description: A long form description of the sink. This should contain links and keywords for SEO purposes.

env_vars.description: The environment variables supported by this sink, keyed by the variables's name.

examples.description: Simple examples demonstrating how to use this sink.

features.description: A list of human readable features.

function_category.description: The function category the sink serves. Used for filtering.

healthcheck.description: If the sink implements a healthcheck.

noun.description: The noun that would be used in a sentence.

options.description: The options provided by this sink, keyed by the option's name.

permissions.description: The permissions required for this sink to work.

service_limits_short_link.description: A link to the target service's limits, if applicable.

service_name.description: The name of the underlying service that this component integrates with.

service_providers.description: Any service providers that offer this service.

write_to_description.description: Short one sentence description of where the sink writes.

beta.description: Is the source in beta status?

common.description: Is this a common source that should be highlighted in a full list of sources?

description.description: A long form description of the source. This should contain links and keywords for SEO purposes.

env_vars.description: The environment variables supported by this source, keyed by the variables's name.

examples.description: Simple examples demonstrating how to use this source.

except_operating_systems.description: A blacklist of operating systems not supported by this source.

features.description: A list of human readable features.

fields.description: Information about field that this source adds to events.

function_category.description: The source's function category, used for filtering.

noun.description: The noun that would be used in a sentence.

only_operating_systems.description: A whitelist of operating systems supported by this source.

options.description: Options provided by this source, keyed by the option name.

permissions.description: The permissions required for this source to work.

output_types.description: The types of events this source outputs.

service_name.description: The name of the underlying service that this component integrates with.

service_providers.description: Any service providers that offer this service.

strategies.description: Any applicable stratgies that this source applies to. Must be strategy names only.

through_description.decription: A short one sentence description describing how this source emits events.

title.description: A simple title for this source, typically one word.

allow_you_to_description.description: A short one sentence description for this tramsform.

beta.description: Is this transform in beta status?

common.description: Is this a common transform that should be highlighted in a full list of transforms?

description.description: A long form description of the transform. This should contain links and keywords for SEO purposes.

env_vars.description: A list of supported environment variables by this transform.

examples.description: Simple examples demonstrating how to use this transform.

fields.description: Information about field that this transform adds to events.

function_category.description: The function category this transform performed. Used for filtering.

input_types.description: The types of events that this transform can receive.

options.description: The options provided by this transform, keyed by the option name.

output_types.description: The types of events this transform outputs.

permissions.description: The permissions required for this transform to work.

title.description: A simple title for this transform, typically one word.
